body:
Hi Giuseppe,


I've had mixed feedback with the linux version of BSDFViewer. And since I
don't have the hardware of knowledge, I can't debug and fix whatever is
causing mixed results. I'm sorry, but I don't think I can offer any help
beyond what has already been posted. It seems like your libraries installed
properly and something is going wrong after the values are returned for the
BSDF query.


For this reason I'm planning to remove support for tensor tree in the Linux
version when I get around to the next update. Tensor Tree support may be a
Mac only feature in upcoming releases.


Best,
Andy








On Thu, Jul 14, 2016 at 5:07 AM, Giuseppe De Michele <giudm.87 at gmail.com>
